description: All you need is one ingredient to make these nutritionally approved mango straps. The kids will rejoice when they find this fruity snack in their lunch box.
keywords: Snack,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Video,Sesame free,Dairy free,Pescatarian,Low salt,Egg free,Halal,Vegetarian,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegan,Nikki P,Mango,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Easy Mango Straps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Snacks,Kids,Fresh Food Kids

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 110°C/90°C fan-forced. Grease and line 2 baking trays with baking paper.
Place mango in a food processor and process for 20 seconds or until a smooth paste forms. Spoon mango on tray and spread until 3mm thick.
Bake for 3 1/2 hours or until mango is dry to touch but still pliable. Cool for 5 minutes, then cut into strips and store in an airtight container until ready to serve.
